channel.title: [PI] Quest point display
channel.description:
How would I place my quest point text here, it would look so much cleaner. It would be greatly appreciated.
[IMG]http://servimg.com/u/f44/15/04/13/47/hsp3dt10.png[/img]

item.title: [PI] Quest point display
item.dc:creator: @tainted4pure tainted4pure
item.description:
@tainted4pure wrote:

huh? no, this has nothing to do with whats inside the quest box where all the quests are located. I need to know what line or how to place where Quest Points: (Your quest points) would go like runescape. - Below the quest box - That picture isnt from my server its just a picture for reference to show what i need .

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest point display
item.dc:creator: @Bubbsy7 Bubbsy7
item.description:
@Bubbsy7 wrote:

Find whatever is there in that box, search it and put a + (your q points here) tab.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest point display
item.dc:creator: @tainted4pure tainted4pure
item.description:
@tainted4pure wrote:

He's saying that's not his server I think he just took that pic from somewhere and said he wants that.

Exactly, I can’t find it anywhere i don’t know if i have to custom make it with the client or is there a line for that position of text in the quest tab.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Quest point display
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Bubbsy7, post:4, topic:441390”]Client.java
Search for quest points: 17
copy it, then delete current like
then search breakin’ news
then paste quest points: 17 under that. <----------------cntrl f to search.[/quote]He’s saying that’s not his server I think he just took that pic from somewhere and said he wants that.

Read full topic
